reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be a great quality piece that is soft, comfortable, and warm, with one customer noting it's perfect for fall and winter. They like its color, with one mentioning the red is bright like a candy cane, and appreciate its nice thickness. The size receives mixed feedback - while some find it perfectly oversized, others note the length is unflatteringly long.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice
items.body: What everyone else says! This sweater is such a nice quality. Soft. Fits well. Very pretty Read more
items.author: Denise

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, great quality cardigan
items.body: Super soft, cozy and great quality fabric! Runs a bit oversized. I got so many compliments when I wore it for an Irish themed/NFL team (with same colors) party. I will look to purchase more of this brand! Read more
items.author: MMT

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price and festive
items.body: Bought this to wear during the holiday season. Good length for a taller person and a thick, soft weave to keep you stylish and warm. A little more snug than I prefer but will work for the holiday season Read more
items.author: Jeff CN

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft!
items.body: Soooo many compliments! It’s extremely soft and warm. Very good quality. Read more
items.author: Alexis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty sweater but runs large
items.body: Nice fabric, very soft I chases the brown and white stripe but had to return. I ordered my regular size suggested a medium and it was huge. I am 5’6” and 135-140 for reference Read more
items.author: Virginia Lass

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars just okay....
items.body: Meh.... it is acrylic, so it is pretty much as expected. (As in, I expected too much.) It stretches dramatically as you wear it, and "grows" in size. You may consider sizing down. I have worn it twice. It is starting to pill a bit. I am 5ft 4 and 156 lbs. I thought I ordered a medium, but sweater says "Small" on the inside. It became much too big as I wore it. I did get out my sewing machine and took in the sleeves. I would not buy again. I purchased it to have a layer with for a football game as the temperature dropped, and it looked cute that night. The color worked for the team's maroon and gold colors. If I wear it a few more times, it will probably be trash by spring. Read more
items.author: Marly T

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great office sweater!
items.body: Love it! I call it my office sweater. I am 5’4, 170lbs and I bought a large. Fits slightly loose on me just like i like. It is comfy and goes with all my business casual work clothes. I wash it on delicate cycle and lay it out to dry. Just bought another one in a different color. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite sweater!
items.body: These are my favorite sweaters!! I have three colors and plan to get more. They are incredibly soft and fit so well. They are great for work, school or weekends. The weight is perfect for fall and winter. There is a slight stretch in the fabric which makes wearing a shirt underneath very comfortable. It is a great value and I highly recommend every color. Read more
items.author: Tina

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red Stripe, Dark Green Stripe, Green Stripe, Apricot Stripe, Blue Stripe, Khaki Stripe, White Stripe, Brown Stripe, Navy Blue Stripe, Black Stripe. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
